first his passive Death Bringer stance

next up the movement speed that world

unfortunately riot decided to pull the

noxious trap will no longer trigger on

Evelyn has held a solid stance in the
meta recently and is receiving buffs for
patch 9 point 18 her ultimate last
caress will have its damage amplifier
against low-health targets increased
from 100 percent to 140 percent this
means that her ultimate has a 180
percent AP scaling holy cow this is a
massive buff for Evelyn which might even
bring her up into the S Plus tier 4
jungle if this buff gets approved and
hits the live server then objectives
like dragon and baron are going to be
borderline impossible to secure against
her get those bands ready because Evelyn
will be opie next patch Lee sin has held
a decent stance in the meta recently and

575 and his base ad has been rounded up
from 69 to 70 next his ultimate dragons
rage will have its damage increased by
25 and all ranks and the cooldown has
been lowered from 110 to 60 to 90 to 60
these are some massive buffs for Lee sin
and it looks like Riot Games is trying
to force him into the World
Championships meta
they just want more highlight reels for
